release.action: Added Japanese messages. Patch provided by Shinji Miyamoto.
Fix for bug 954995 - Crash when IProjectDescription.getLocation() returns null. Patch provided by Michael Scharf.
Minor update of the Eclipse 3.0 version to be compatible with M9.
Made a copy of the v1.0.4 plugin for Eclipse 2.1.x.

Added a check for missing classpath and path variables and user libraries on import. Currently, these missing variables are presented in a message box as a simple information. Also changed the prefix determination algorithm to act in a case insensitive way on Windows.
